all: select * from alt_liquidations where timestamp > dateadd('m', -30, now())
liqsHourly: select ticker, sum(amount), side from 'alt_liquidations' where timestamp > dateadd('h', -{}, now()) group by ticker, side order by max(timestamp) asc;
liqsMinutely: select ticker, sum(amount), side from 'alt_liquidations' where timestamp > dateadd('m', -{}, now()) group by ticker, side order by max(timestamp) asc;
amountLiqd: select sum(amount), side from 'alt_liquidations' group by side
sampled15m: select ticker, sum(amount), timestamp from 'alt_liquidations' where timestamp > dateadd('h', -4, now()) sample by 15m order by sum(amount) DESC
liqCountAmount: select count(), sum(amount), side, timestamp from 'alt_liquidations' where timestamp > dateadd('h', -4, now()) sample by 5m
tickerLiqCountAmount: select count(), sum(amount), side, avg(price), timestamp from 'alt_liquidations' where ticker = '{}' sample by 5m
log: select ticker, amount, side, price from 'alt_liquidations' order by timestamp desc limit 14
